attributes.action: help us stop traffic pollution by doing a NO car day once a week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
help us stop traffic pollution by doing a NO car day once a week (inc saturday and sunday)
i am really concerned about global warming and i am only 12, so i am scared of not having a proper future!
Having a NO car day once a week will cut vehical accidents by a lot, save money on buying petrol,and of course if every one did it then it will help on cutting down pollution!!
Please help me to get a NO vehical day to save the planet!!
